reviews.name: helen
reviews.title: aromatherapy massage and reiki healing
reviews.review: I am a client of Aishling and  can recommend her , her treatments and her healing geodesic dome very highly . She is a lovely person - very professional and understanding and is very passionate about her  therapies and her clients . It is a wonderful little place to switch off and relax and to be pampered.
